thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Airport Stay
thread.title_full: Excellent Airport Stay - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Chris T
title: Excellent Airport Stay
text: I needed a place to stay before an early flight back home to the east coast. I wanted a quiet room and shuttle to the airport. Hyatt delivered. Grace, at the front desk, took about 2 mins to make sure I had the most quiet room ever and provided excellent customer service. The hostess at the bar also helped me with getting me a snack for breakfast since I was leaving long before the kitchen would be open. Shuttle was very fast to the airport (from the airport is much slower). Would stay here again in a heartbeat
